name: Jobe Armor Tier 2
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ a piece of Jobe Armor Tier 1 #L "Click here" "/tell recipe 58" for recipe #L "Consanguineal Embryo of Yomi'Arallu" "239836" #L "Canister Of Pure Liquid Notum" "223446" a special Advent x 3 ( ie : #L "Advent of the Industrious " "239475" ) a Will x 3 ( ie #L "Will of The Reposeful" "239469" ) ------------------------------ First ------------------------------ Upgrade your Jobe Armor Tier 1 up to lvl 160. Some jobe Armor part doesn't exist in Tier 1 form, but you can upgrade them to QL 160 using a #L "Joker's Glyph" "227905" on it. Go to jobe and give the Consanguineal Embryo of Yomi'Arallu and the Three Will to your Profession IPS, he will give you a Red Glyph ( ie #L "Red Glyph of Enel" "218342" ). Then, give him the 3 Advents, he will you a Glyph ( ie #L "Horned Black Glyph of Shere" "218347" ). ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Canister Of Pure Liquid Notum + Red Glyph = Red Glyph - Awakened ( ie #L "Red Glyph of Aban - Awakened" "227625" ) Skills: | QP | ------------------------------ Red Glyph - Awakened + Glyph = Profession Red Glyph ( ie #L "Red Glyph of the Lovers" "227795" ) Skills: | PS | ------------------------------ Profession Red Glyph + a piece of Jobe Armor Tier 1 = a part of Jobe Armor Tier 2 ( ie #L "Second Tier Doctor Suit Pants" "214755" ) Skills: | PS | ------------------------------ Details ------------------------------ Adventurer #L "Will of the Reposefull" "239469" #L "Advent of the Prudent" "239478" Agent #L "Will of the Tempestuous" "239470" #L "Advent of the Impetuous" "239480" Bureaucrat #L "Will of the Tempestuous" "239470" #L "Advent of the Passionate" "239479" Doctor #L "Will of the Reposefull" "239469" #L "Advent of the Benign" "239476" Enforcer #L "Will of the Unshakable" "239471" #L "Advent of the Prudent" "239478" Engineer #L "Will of the Unshakable" "239471" #L "Advent of the Industrious" "239475" Fixer #L "Will of the Reposefull" "239469" #L "Advent of the Impetuous" "239480" Keeper #L "Will of the Unshakable" "239471" #L "Advent of the Benign" "239476" Martial Artist #L "Will of the Unshakable" "239471" #L "Advent of the Impetuous" "239480" Metaphysicist #L "Will of the Reposefull" "239469" #L "Advent of the Passionate" "239479" Nano Technician #L "Will of the Tempestuous" "239470" #L "Advent of the Benign" "239476" Shade #L "Will of the Unshakable" "239471" #L "Advent of the Passionate" "239479" Soldier #L "Will of the Tempestuous" "239470" #L "Advent of the Prudent" "239478" Trader #L "Will of the Reposefull" "239469" #L "Advent of the Industrious" "239475" ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Thats tier 2 complete only #L "Tier 3" "/tell recipe 57" to go!
